summary: An eccentric socialite with an knack for pulling off hopelessly wild adventures struggles when she finds herself disowned by her millionaire father and abandoned by her teenage son.
cast: Lisa Ann Walter|Kurtwood Smith|Mason Gamble|J.P. Manoux|John M. Watson Sr.|Saralynne Crittenden|Jeff Clampitt|Debbie Kellogg|Mike Meiners|Ora Jones|Anthony Moseley|Drew Mikuska|Heather Prete|John LaGuardia|Jennifer Liu|Ray Austin|Billy Wauer|Lindsey Brooke|Bernard Mixon|Craig J. Harris|Tony Sancho|Barrie D. Buckner Jr.|Omar Halais|Ted Aliotta|Khan Lowe|Victor Mancia|Johnny Whitecloud|Bob Brown|Sarah Paz Hyde|John Lordan|Ernest Perry Jr.|Nathan Adloff|Dan Ahn|Maggie Curley|Mimi Sagadin|Sean Skyler|Jeff Solano
title: The Trouble with Dee Dee
